The annual meeting of the Cognitive Development Society was held in Pasadena, CA. Members of the Perception, Action, and Development Lab and collaborators contributed five posters. 

Aylin Luna, Kari Kretch, and John Franchak presented ["Predictors of Skill Expression in Infantsâ€™ Everyday Behavior"](2024-images/Luna_CDS_2024.pdf)

![](2024-images/Luna_CDS_2024.jpg){width="100%" fig-align="center"}

Hailey Rousey, Maximilian Tang, Sahrai Garcia, and John Franchak presented ["Exploring the Relation Between Infany Body Position and Adult Language Input Across the Day"](2024-images/Rousey_2024_CDS.pdf)

![](2024-images/Rousey_CDS_2024.jpg){width="100%" fig-align="center"}

Yushan Guo, Maximilian Tang, and John Franchak presented ["Characterizing Infant Object Experience through Repeated Video Sampling Across the Day"](2024-images/Guo_2024_CDS.pdf)

![](2024-images/Guo_CDS_2024.jpg){width="100%" fig-align="center"}

Maximilian Tang, Hailey Rousey, Sahrai Garcia, and John Franchak presented ["Does Infant Vocalization Increase when Sitting in Daily Life?"](2024-images/Tang_2024_CDS.pdf)

![](2024-images/Tang_CDS_2024.jpg){width="100%" fig-align="center"}
Allyson Kuznia, Jena Miko, Kayla McComb, Caitlin Fausey, and John Franchak presented ["The everyday objects that younger and older USA infants hold"](2024-images/Kuznia_2024_CDS.pdf)

![](2024-images/Kuznia_CDS_2024.jpg){width="100%" fig-align="center"}
